授業目的:
1. Becoming familiar with molecular biology knowledge techniques
2. Understand the various techniques in the discovery of DNA and RNA
到達目標: I hope this lecture will contribute to them to be familiar and more proficient in reading and critiquing references or literature
授業方法: Before the lecture, master students are suggested to prepare by themselves concerning the knowledge of molecular biology based on the textbook or journal that is offered as references. There will be a temporary discussion and spontaneous questions in order to know whether the students understand or not. The references (Journal) will be announced during the lecture.

第2回: The nucleic acids and tools for analysis
第3回: Genomic approaches to the nucleic acid analysis
第5回: The interaction between the nucleic acids and proteins
トピック.授業外学習2: They do not need outside class. Students have the task to read some book as I have already proposed in this schedule and must follow my lecture in online (Due to some master students are still in overseas countries)

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【511】国際自然科学特殊講義IV【分子生物学】／Special Lec. in Int'l Natural Sci.IV
担当者: アンドリアナ　Ｂ．（ANDRIANA BIBIN BINTANG）
